name: Bazaar Krovod
originalText: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

rulings.text: Bazaar Krovod’s ability can target an attacking creature that’s untapped (such as one with vigilance).
Untapping an attacking creature doesn’t cause it to stop attacking or remove it from combat.

text: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.
